keywords: ['lesson recording', 'guitar lesson', 'electric guitar', 'clean sound', 'simple tune', 'male voice', 'instructive speaking']
caption: This is the recording of a guitar lesson. The instructor at first plays the chords on a clean sounding electric guitar and then describes the nature of the chord that he is playing. The chords that were strummed could be used as clean electric guitar samples in beat-making.
